hard_skills: high current and high voltage test sets

experience.role_description: Managed software across all products in Decatur IL, Joliet IL, and North Little Rock AR. Provided 24-hour support to field reps, assembly workers, and line supervisors worldwide. Traveled to various locations including Russia, Mossville IL, East Peoria IL, and North Little Rock AR. Managed multiple software releases concerning CPI projects and developed Tier IV Final standards and procedures for BOM processing, flashing software, and documenting engine with engine-aftertreatment information.

Managed production and rebuild of LV and MV circuit breakers. Conducted projects on various job sites involving testing and installation of electrical switchgear. Established lockout/tag-out procedures and implemented Auto-Cad to design electrical and mechanical diagrams.

Conducted training courses concerning safety awareness, use of test equipment, and machinery. Reconditioned LV and MV circuit breakers to meet the latest standards of power conventional flow. Tested circuit breakers using various test equipment.

education.description: Industrial Engineering Management, Electrical Engineering Technology
